title: Does this map show the prevalence of crazy cow disease against Prexit voters?
subtitle: There is a map that allegedly shows that the areas affected by crazy cow disease in 1992 ended up voting for "departure" in 2016.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The regions that voted to leave the European Union in the "Brixet" vote in 2016 were the same as those affected by crazy cow disease in 1992.
